title: Train Project
description: This is my train project where I had to assemble pieces of the train to combine together. I also made another assembly file which made the train move across the train tracks

title: Bench Project
description: For this project, I was tasked with improving a product in the world already. An idea my group mates and I came up with was a rotating bench. If one side of the bench was wet or dirty, you could flip the bench to the other side to sit on.

title: Patterns Project
description: For this project, I had to recreate patterns as you can see here. This was created in AutoDesk AutoCAD and I used circles and lines extensively. There were small specific dimensions that were in each one such as a radius of a circle etc. I then used the hatch command and colored these in.
